EmailTemplate.name: 17.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.L.G.N.17206.AirScale 2017.Email 3 - Beyond Gigabit
EmailTemplate.subject: You can’t see the future, but it will be fast
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Massive MIMO, a 5G building block today Accelerate your network to beyond gigabit speeds Massive carrier aggregation and massive MIMO are proven to deliver 5G-like experiences. We’ve shown Massive MIMO with carrier aggregation for up to 5x more capacity and higher peak rates, as well as 4.2 Gbps using massive carrier aggregation. Welcome to endless new business possibilities. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
